name: autonomous-dev
description: PROJECT.md-first autonomous development with 20 specialized agents, 27 skills, and 42 automation hooks. Full SDLC automation via /auto-implement command. Zero scope creep with automatic PROJECT.md validation. Works for Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Go projects.
longDescription:
Transform your development workflow with autonomous agents that handle the full SDLC automatically.

**What it does:**
- Validates every feature against PROJECT.md goals BEFORE work begins (zero scope creep)
- Researches best practices automatically
- Plans architecture and integration points
- Writes tests first (TDD)
- Implements code to pass tests
- Reviews code quality
- Scans for security vulnerabilities
- Updates documentation automatically

**20 Specialized Agents:**
Core Workflow (9): researcher, planner, test-master, implementer, reviewer, security-auditor, doc-master, advisor, quality-validator

Utility (11): alignment-validator, commit-message-generator, pr-description-generator, issue-creator, brownfield-analyzer, project-progress-tracker, alignment-analyzer, project-bootstrapper, setup-wizard, project-status-analyzer, sync-validator

Note: orchestrator removed in v3.2.2 - Claude coordinates directly

**20 Commands:**
- Core Workflow (11): /auto-implement, /batch-implement, /align-project, /align-claude, /align-project-retrofit, /setup, /sync, /status, /health-check, /pipeline-status, /update-plugin
- Individual Agents (8): /research, /plan, /test-feature, /implement, /review, /security-scan, /update-docs, /create-issue
- Utility (1): /test

**27 Skills (Progressive Disclosure):**
Core Development (7): api-design, architecture-patterns, code-review, database-design, testing-guide, security-patterns, error-handling-patterns

Workflow & Automation (7): git-workflow, github-workflow, project-management, documentation-guide, agent-output-formats, skill-integration, skill-integration-templates

Code & Quality (4): python-standards, observability, consistency-enforcement, file-organization

Validation & Analysis (6): research-patterns, semantic-validation, cross-reference-validation, documentation-currency, advisor-triggers, project-alignment-validation

Library Design (3): library-design-patterns, state-management-patterns, api-integration-patterns

**42 Automation Hooks:**
Core (11): auto_format, auto_test, security_scan, validate_project_alignment, validate_claude_alignment, enforce_file_organization, enforce_pipeline_complete, enforce_tdd, detect_feature_request, auto_git_workflow, auto_approve_tool

Optional (20+): Coverage enforcement, documentation sync, issue tracking, and more

**21 Reusable Libraries:**
Core utilities for security, validation, automation, and brownfield retrofit

**Key Features:**
- PROJECT.md-first: Every feature validates against strategic goals
- Batch processing: /batch-implement handles 50+ features sequentially
- Crash recovery: State-based resume for interrupted workflows
- GitHub integration: Auto-create issues with research
- Parallel validation: 60% faster quality checks
- Context management: Scale to 100+ features without bloat

**Result:** Focus on features, everything else is automatic.

features.title: Knowledge Base System
features.description: Auto-bootstraps starter knowledge, caches research, 90% faster on repeat topics

features.title: PROJECT.md-First Architecture
features.description: Every feature validated against strategic goals before implementation

features.title: 8 Specialized Agents
features.description: From planning (Opus) to security auditing (Haiku), optimized for cost and quality

features.title: Automatic Quality Enforcement
features.description: Formatting, testing, security, and docs updated automatically

features.title: Three-Layer Testing
features.description: Code coverage (pytest) + Quality coverage (GenAI) + System performance (meta-analysis)

features.title: GitHub Integration
features.description: Auto-create issues from test failures, track progress (optional)

features.title: Progressive Commit Workflow
features.description: 4 levels from quick commit to full release with README rebuild

features.title: Context Management
features.description: Session logs instead of bloated context - scale to 100+ features

features.title: Language Agnostic
features.description: Works for Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, and more

steps: Run setup: `/setup` to copy files to your project
Configure PROJECT.md: Define your project goals and scope
Start developing: Write code, everything else is automatic!
